website_summaries.verdict: This electric mini bike may not have the range of a gas-powered model, but many parents prefer the safety and reliability of battery-powered motors.
pros: Two speed selections for younger and older riders
Ideal for first time riders, but older riders can always turn up the speed control
cons: Electronic components not as durable as the bike itself

customer_reviews.title: I'm a civilian contractor and weigh 220lbs and this thing still moves pretty good. it was larger than i expected and ...
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this mini bike and sent it to a friend who took it apart and mailed it to me in Afghanistan. I'm a civilian contractor and weigh 220lbs and this thing still moves pretty good. it was larger than i expected and the battery lasts only slightly less that the advertised 45mins but I'm sure this due to my size. It handles the rough terrain well and has been ridden by just about everyone i work with even a guy that weighs 280 so if your looking for a little fun i would defiantly recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fun mini bike but with issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun mini bike but I have to give it 3 stars due to issues. My fuse keeps popping from the first day I used it. Troubleshooted with customer support and learned that the brake pads was too close to the disk which made the controller work too hard and result to popping the fuse. They sent replacement for the controller and acceleration grip. It's better now that the parts was replaced and I adjusted the brakes but it still pop a fuse one time. I will call support and see why.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Tocao

customer_reviews.title: Biggest problem is when you have to share.
customer_reviews.text: When people see how much fun these are, you'll want to get 2. There's no suspension, not good for going off jumps, and if you're going through very heavy brush, things get jammed up pretty quick, but it wasn't built for those things. Fixing it is very easy as there's very few moving parts with this electric motor. It was built to go a zippy 17mph off roading, on relatively flat surfaces in such an easy way to drive that no motorcycle experience is necessary. My wife jumped on it and while never riding a motorcycle or scooter of any kind, immediately got comfortable and loved it within 2 minutes of riding it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lim

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this little bike
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this little bike. However it was not made very durable for the excessive daily use if a 7 year old. We have had to have a new charger as the one that came with it died 3 days after the bike arrived. Then just last week we had to get a new ignition switch as it had burned out. I will say all of this has been covered free of charge by the manufacturer however it was at least 7 days each time that the bike we down waiting for the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Tbglover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality, handsome minibike.  Not a department store pice of junk.  MADE IN USA  !
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality. Great looking minibike. Totally impressed with the structure engineering and "heft" of this bike. Strong material 99.99% pre built ( bolt on handle bars pre-wired) charge and go. Everything's included even the nuts bolt, tools. Can't miss. My boy is going to go totally bonkers for this Christmas gift. PS rated up to 130 lbs, 14 MPH. My boy is 50 lbs ! Whoo Hooooooo.
customer_reviews.author: Kippington

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only 4 or 5 rides
customer_reviews.text: This has been a horrible experience. First, the chain broke the first day. I waited a month for a replacement from moto and when that didn't come, I bought my own. After replacing the chain and going through a few more charge cycles and rides, it suddenly stopped short in the middle of a short ride. Plug it in to charge and it doesn't charge. Lights up and stuff but when you pull the charger, it dies immediately. Bad battery already? Bad charger? I don't know. All I know is it cost about $75 per ride. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ironosity

customer_reviews.title: Never was able to turn on
customer_reviews.text: I’d give battery life even less than one star if at all possible. Came and battery didn’t charge at all. It was easy enough to put together. And he was excited to give it a try - but just didn’t work out. Might try a gas powered one so we don’t have to worry about batteries n
customer_reviews.author: John stults

customer_reviews.title: Well built. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Had to put the handlebars on and it was ready to go. My only complaint is battery life. It lasts the hour it says it will. Just wish they made a longer battery life for the the price. My 4 year old absolutely loves it I fashioned some homemade training wheels and if he goes, riding his motorcycle with his big brothers. We have minibikes (us adults lol) so we all ride together. He still isnt comfortable with the "fast" speed yet but hes getting there. I'm very impressed with how well built it is. Hes tough on stuff and hasnt broken this yet.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Very fun. Good power. Good quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun. Son loves it. Easy to use. Fast. Son is 60 pounds. Moves him no problem up hills and through rough terrain. He can just hop on it and hit the on switch. No need for gas or having to pull start. Moves me too!!! I'm 180lbs and it also has no issue. I'm glad I bought this one. Has plenty of power for most people! This is the same frame as their gas powered model. If you want to upgrade to a gas engine in the future for more power just remove the electric motor and install a engine. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 99 Problems
customer_reviews.text: We received the bike, fully assembled, on a big, oversized box. There was no manual or application stickers. The front fender was broken off (not in the box, so that happened before it was ever shipped to us). We’ve had nothing but problems since receiving it, much to the disappointment of my son, who received it for his birthday. The company that manufactured it is out of business, and so far we’ve spent $140 on replacement parts. Hopefully we’ve uncovered the issue, but I would not recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: BrookesMom

customer_reviews.title: the bike itself awesome. But the only thing missing is 1 clamp ...
customer_reviews.text: the bike itself awesome. But the only thing missing is 1 clamp for the handlebars. The box was damaged and the bag the tools and clamps comes in was torn and the tools were all over the box. Not a big deal except we need the 2nd clamp for the handlebars
customer_reviews.author: Jay O.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Thx
customer_reviews.text: Ok 5 Five stars even though the Box Was Beat Up. So now Forget that.This Unit was not Hurt, In Fact Perfect, I love this little Sucker For my Grandson,,, Awesome Made And Kicks But for a 250 Watt,, Love it 10 Stars Hows That
customer_reviews.author: wizard2465

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer Will Not Acknowledge Warranty Request!
customer_reviews.text: Two issues with the bike: 1) defective battery charger and 2) chain will not stay on (too long). Have called and sent email warranty request, per manufacturer. Now that I try calling or emailing to follow-up, the phone number doesn't work. I suspect they went out of business. We were able to run the bike for a few hours as long as we continued to re-install chain. Then battery drained and now it's completely dead. While trying to get replacement chain and charger, return window expired with Amazon. Poor experience with Monster Moto and Amazon. Will not purchase a large item like this again through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ritch Paprocki

customer_reviews.title: Garbage....
customer_reviews.text: Was fun for 3 days. Then, the chain fell off every single time ridden within 2 minutes. Called company multiple times, and they only refer you to some videos. Watched, multiple times.... the issue with chain falling off was the engine was not mounted correctly, so the video was worthless. Called and tried to explain. Said I would get a call back.... that was 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Bmxbrown

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little bike. Can’t wait to use it more when the weather warms. Have one issue with the battery indicator lights on the handlebars not working. I’ve emailed support and will update the review after I receive a response.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco D'Anconia

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.  Need upgraded battery.
customer_reviews.text: Little bike is perfect for my small 4 yr old. Only problem, after 40 minutes we have to recharge. Would like seller to contact me with alternate battery options. Sweet little bike. Little dude loves it and sister is jealous. Nice tires too, just street. Build is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: After a year and a half, still running
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in Christmas of 2014 for our then 7 year-old daughter. It's very tiny and low to the ground as expected, but this thing is still running! She's now 8.5 and her knees are up in the handle bars but she still rides up and down the street without any trouble. We also live on a hill and it pulls her up the hill and up our driveway. We were a little worried about the money spent but the amount of use this has seen has made it worth it. We'll be passing this down to our nieces now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn W.

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!!!! CHEAP CHINESE BIKE, ASSEMBLED IN THE USA. STEER CLEAR!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a crapy bike. It never worked since the day I purchased it. The manufacturing company Monster Moto directed me to a local company for repair. After more than a month, the bike came back with the same condition. It ran for 5 minutes then stopped completely and the bike never ran again. Don't even bother purchasing such a product. Look somewhere for an electric mini bike. This one will be a big headache.
customer_reviews.author: Leesee

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them 2 yrs into the,
customer_reviews.text: Have had 2 yrs best thing we ever bought the grandkids, would buy again in heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Edinger

customer_reviews.title: Battery life & speed are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on this is terrible. Right from day one we needed a replacement the day it came. Now it's just good for 20 minutes at best after full charge which takes a long time. The mph is wrong as well. It's do slow.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three great grandchildren. What disaster! My poor grandson spent more time getting parts new battery etc etc than the little guys got to ride it!
customer_reviews.author: Lil Sis

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and already broke down.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son's birthday, assembled the small bit that needed done and started charging it. A few hours later, when to test it out and see what we are working with. Wouldn't start, none of the lights on the ignition turned on. Figured it was a charger issue, so called and they sent a new one. Charged it for the second time, and still nothing. Doesn't work at all. The woman on the line was extremely rude. Left my number for the manager to return my call so we'll see how that goes. Wouldn't recommend this product at all due to the fact it's brand new and already needs replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Razor instead
customer_reviews.text: -Throttle didn’t work when delivered. (Replacement was sent.) -Blew fuse 2nd time riding. -They designed it in which the plug is in probably the absolute worst / hardest to get to spot on the bike. -Chain came lose and won’t stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Best pit bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best pit bike for the money....It doesn't have rear suspension so us with a few extra LB's can ride. Silent, torquey, reliable, low maintenance. Just put the bars on and go........awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian KTM

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my youngest son so he had something to ride. He loves it, not super fast even with the "speed switch engaged"...my wife can ride it, but it's not super comfy... My boy is 9 and has almost outgrown it for comfy day-to-day riding.
customer_reviews.author: D Cincy M

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love them. Bought 2. Charge lasts about 40 minutes. The one was missing the charger but we called and they sent right out. Very happy 5 and 8 year old boy and girl
customer_reviews.author: katherine lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as it should be
customer_reviews.text: It does not go 7mph on the slow setting. Maybe on the fast setting it goes 7mph. It's more like 4mph. Box also came demolished from the factory. Not just shipping box. Seems like it was a return item. I wouldn't buy or recomend unless its on sale for less than $250.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Very good beginner bike
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson loves this bike. I like everything about it. the only downside that I can think of is that my yard is not level at all and it is kind of hard on the bike but on level surfaces, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 year old son. He knows how to ride a regular bike and this was perfect for him. Great speed, great handling. Not too fast for me but he felt like he was racing! So far we love it! Brakes work great, all the parts seem to be great quality. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ethan

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids absolutely love this item. They are 5 and 6 years old. I continue to receive videos of them zipping around their property like pros. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Romer

customer_reviews.title: Awful waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson for Christmas so he was unable to really ride it for a few months - had to wait till spring came. After only being charged twice it shorted out and is no longer usable. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Total Lemon
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived, easy to assemble. Our son was anxiously waiting for it to charge after getting it for Xmas. 6 hours go by...the charger blew our outlet, bad fuse, and wires were wired improperly. Now have to return and purchase a different brand. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: D Gargano

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t you ensure an item functioned properly before sending it to a consumer?!? I would...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work...did not charge...only received one decal (pink) when the advertising indicated red and pink...battery charger instantly illuminated green indicating a full charge but still didn’t work...handlebars were damaged as if the item was preowned...I’m glad I didn’t show this item to my child before assembling and assuring that it functioned as expected, a total let down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When you receive the bike is set for slow speed.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my 6 year old grandson. He loves it. He has name his bike Red Bull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: A little faster than expected, has a long battery life, (longer than mine at 50+ years) turned out to be a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: donnie s baker

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love it perfect for 5-6year olds
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged in shipping I've tried to contact company. Stickers were destroyed due to holes in box. Just want a new set of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Crouch

customer_reviews.title: works well but won't pull 180lb person up a hill
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to assemble and I even bought the front shock absorbers and installed those. It goes quite well on flat surfaces or those with a small incline; however, will not pull me up a steep hill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box and missing handlebar bolts
customer_reviews.text: The box was damaged, taped and the tool kit/hardware bag was broken. The bolts were missing so assembly could not be accomplished. The bike is slightly smaller than expected so I am not sure whether to ask for the bolts or just return the entire item.
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Ramsthel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Mini Bike and would recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little Mini Bike and would recommended. Stay away from the Mongoose brand as they use cheep parts and felt like a knock off. I originally bought that one and it would not take a charge. The Monster Moto is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O.

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old son received for christmas and he loved it. easy to ride for beginners and a good looking mini bike. well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Robert Neville

customer_reviews.title: ... for over two hours with still charge - would recommend this thank
customer_reviews.text: fast shipped- 6 year old son loves it - long battery life - he's gone on full for over two hours with still charge - would recommend this thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Much, much higher quality build than I expectred.
customer_reviews.author: david cook

customer_reviews.title: Tough little motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in beat up holes in it but motorcycle ok my grandson loves it rides it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Big George

customer_reviews.title: Shipped to me broke! Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service, Looks like a nice well-made bike but we never got to use it it was shipped to us with the manufacture date of 2017 the batteries are bad and will not charge when I asked monster Moto to send me some new batteries they never even responded I left multiple emails and phone calls with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan marino

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DOA
customer_reviews.text: Kids waited for a week for their birthday present to arrive. Unfortunately, while the box looked OK, the bike was pretty beat up. The on/off button was broken and consequently the bike was useless. I'm sure Amazon will do the right thing and send me a new one, but having to deal with the return and my kids's disappointment merit the one-star review.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Regular Joe

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer does NOT help resolve problems
customer_reviews.text: The MegaMoto bike did not charge after the initial charge it arrived with. Mega Moto was unresponsive to resolving this issue. I contacted the Better Business Bureau who attempted to reach the manufacturer and Mega Moto never responded to them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Charging issues
customer_reviews.text: After 3 times of use the bike would not take a charge. Not sure of problem..Charger,plug or batteries. Ad doesn't list any kind of contact number for problems. Going to contact Monster Moto and see what happens since the bike is only a week old.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect minibike for a child to learn on
customer_reviews.text: This minibike is perfect for a child to learn on. Our 5 year old rides it easily and can reach the handle for the brakes. The adjustable speed is the best part as your child can learn to use the throttle and brakes on low speed and then switch when needed. The battery lasts awhile as well. Great buy and I recommend to anyone who wants there child to learn how to ride a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This fell apart within 4 uses. Tires are old and became flat, all the [parts rust without being in weather (garage kept) and the charger no longer works. Garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Broke down a few days after purchase. Took long to get repair setup and the facility is 45 minutes away. Not looking forward to the drive x4
customer_reviews.author: a obeid

customer_reviews.title: Bike is nice good fit for my 6 year old son but ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike is nice good fit for my 6 year old son but no stickers came in box. He was a bit bummed about that. I never could find a link to contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good started bike that’s easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Our ages range from 6-9. All three enjoy. Good started bike that’s easy to ride and safe.
customer_reviews.author: IGotYour6

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not stay charged
customer_reviews.text: Bike is slower than item description, and the batter life is well below expected results
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old little guys loves his motorcycle! Our 10 and 6 year old ride it at well on the fast mode!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's been great. My super coordinated tiny 5 year old loves ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been great. My super coordinated tiny 5 year old loves it. My less coordinated 8 year old really likes it as well. Charge lasts suprisingly long (more than an hour). Has survived a couple light wipe-outs wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hatchell

customer_reviews.title: Broken bike from delivery ruined my daughter's Santa present
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bike for my 6 year old daughter and opened the box on Christmas eve to put it together and both front forks were broken. Needless to say she was sad that her Santa gift is broken and she can't ride the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This bike has brought my 10 and 13 year old so much joy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Kingwell

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bike
customer_reviews.text: Solid built, grandson loves it! Box arrived all beat up and one of the fenders (plastic) had a piece broken but still a very nice bike.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Well build and the kids love
customer_reviews.text: Meets all expectations. Well build and the kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Bates

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: When you ordered it there is Tares and damages all over the package and damages to the bike
customer_reviews.author: Maddison Gipson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: best bang for the buck. very strong, pulled me just fine at 235 lbs
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY C PFINGST

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This bike does not hold a charge. Had it less than a year and can’t get it to charge or find a location to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT, durable bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only took my son a couple of tries (he was 4 years old) before getting the hang of it. Now 5, he is already using the faster speed. A GREAT, durable bike for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my grandson he loves it. very good product reliable and very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: GI#1

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this bike last month and we are so pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bike last month and we are so pleased with it. My son loves it it is built very nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L Jones

customer_reviews.title: ... had these for a month and so far so good. My two 5yr
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a month and so far so good. My two 5yr. olds are the most popular kids at the park.
customer_reviews.author: wondr55

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a Christmas gift to a 4 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a Christmas gift to a 4 year old grandson. He loves it. Seems to be a well built machine.
customer_reviews.author: MB.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase so far !!
customer_reviews.text: So far...so good! My grandchildren haven't ridden them yet, but I am impressed with the quality of these bikes. Real rubber tires and disc brakes are so appreciated. I've charged them up and ready to go as surprise gift for moving back to the States. Lots of care went into the design of these bikes and I feel they are a good value.
customer_reviews.author: starfishsp

customer_reviews.title: Well built and lasts king time on single charge
customer_reviews.text: We bought this primarily for our 4 year old on his birthday. He is a motorcycle nut, and had been looking forward to getting a real motorcycle. The stand over height is nice and low, allowing him to easily put both feet down when he stops. Just releasing the throttle stops the bike quickly, which allows him to focus on his balance and throttle control before we add the brake.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really a great bike, my son loves it! And it's built to last, very durable.Very satisfied with the buy and excellent customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy !!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Great product!!! Made my sons birthday! He's four but has been begging for a REAL motorcycle. I purchased a set of training wheels to go with this and it works great for him. Fast setting will have to wait a few more years
customer_reviews.author: sadie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I was afraid it was going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was afraid it was going to be too big and for my son who just turned four. He knows how to ride a regular bike without training wheels and was able to ride this on the slower setting right away! We haven't tried him on the faster setting (even though he keeps begging). I used my own decal because I didn't like the standard ones.
customer_reviews.author: kristen birkenbach

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to put back on
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson has ridden this non-stop (when weather permits). The only problem we've had with it is that the chain slips off occasionally. Fairly easy to put back on, but it's a nuisance. Very durable and well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great so far. For parent on the line between an powerwheel, other ride on and this one...go with this. son is 2 and loves it gonna make some training wheels.
customer_reviews.author: tmarko

customer_reviews.title: ... 6 year old grandson he now calls me the best grandpa ever in the world
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 6 year old grandson he now calls me the best grandpa ever in the world, enough said
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 6 year old. She loves it. Didn’t take her long to learn how to balance on it. Her older sister loves it too & is asking for one for Christmas. Well made. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: coffmans52

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday and he loves it! It's easy to drive and battery last a long time. It is very heavy so safety gear is definitely required.
customer_reviews.author: Bek_With

customer_reviews.title: Ninja boy 636
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made well worth the money great for a firts starfter bike my grandson loves his new bike i do recommend .
customer_reviews.author: yosemity sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Can barely get them off it. Battery outlasts them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike is great. Fast well built and fun. I also bought the MM-80 for my 11 year old and got the electric got my 6 and 8 year old. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good! My son loves riding it! It's he's favorite thing to do everyday! Great; exactly like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Tanesha Norfleet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 4 year old for Christmas so he could keep up with his 6 year old brother. It took him about 15 min to have it down. He absolutely loves it! We moved up to the higher speed after about a week with no problems. We were impressed with its sturdiness and it’s smooth ride. It was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

product_meta.title: Mega Moto - Electric Mini Bike - 250W (MM-E250-PR)(Black w/ Pink and Red Decals Included)
product_meta.description: Who says older kids should have all the fun on our bikes? We created our classic 250W e-Mini for our own “kick-butt, take names younger kids, ” and now it is time to share it with the world! Have you ever seen a toy with a metal disc brake? Neither have we. Our electric mini bike is not a toy; toys don’t last! Designed for the rugged outdoors, this e-Mini was built to last with the same durable construction and welded-steel frame as our gas-powered products. With a top speed of 11 mph, this bike is meant for the little adventurer in all of us. But as parents, we know that safety comes first – so all of our e-Minis also come with a toggle switch that governs the speed down to 7 mph. This e-bike has motorcycle throttle control with a charge indicator. The battery charger hookup is built in and the charger is included. The charger connects directly to the e-Mini and fully charges the battery pack in 5 hours. Always know your charge level with the charge status indicator mounted on the handlebars! The electric mini bikes power comes from the 250W motor with rechargeable and replaceable 7AH 24V battery pack. The continuous run time is 45 min. Maximum on a full charge. We include both red AND pink decals, so you can customize it to your liking! Mega Moto warrants to the original retail purchaser of this product that it is free from defects in material and/or workmanship for a period of ninety (90) days from the date of purchase. Mega Moto builds every bike and go-kart to the highest quality standards. Our bikes are bigger, stronger, safer, and faster for the ultimate experience. Monster Moto is proud to launch the NEW Mega Moto line of products in Q4 2018. As part of our brand evolution, we are launching a new line of products built in the same tradition of Monster Moto products. Kids can explore the outdoors with confidence on Monster Moto and Mega Moto vehicles.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE TO SET UP - This classic e-mini bike comes pre-assembled and includes a toolkit. Simply attach the adjustable handlebars, charge the battery pack and go!
DURABLE - The 250W is durably constructed with a reinforced welded tube steel frame and polypropylene no-dent fenders providing the toughness you need to conquer the outdoors.

SAFETY FIRST - With a safety speed limiter switch that allows parents of young riders to toggle between 7 and 11 mph this electric mini bike was built with safety in mind. The rear hand operated cable actuated rear disc brake allows for safe and reliable stopping.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX - Mega Moto Classic 250W Electric Mini Bike, charger, tool kit and all hardware required to complete the assembly of the unit, rechargeable/replaceable batteries, owner's manual, and pink and red decal sets.

DECALS - Please note that with our recent brand change, you may receive a unit that has Monster Moto decals and packaging. Not to worry! Whether “Mega” or “Monster”, it’s the exact same great Moto product!

specifications.Cover Included: Mega Moto Classic Electric Mini Bike. Charger. Tool kit and all hardware required to complete the assembly of the unit. Owner's Manual. Certificate of OriginPink and red decal sets.
